reviewText: The video is a little dated, using RPMs, but is a great resource and worth every penny.
Great technique advice. Looking forward to applying it on the water.
Lots of old school boats.  Great tips on technique.

Great instruction... very detailed &  alot of it!  Kayaking is such a technical sport, professional quaility instruction is what us "newbies" crave!!  would be better if it was updated. but still had all the pertinent quaility instruction
1

Kent Ford is a methodical communicator; Breakthrough expertly lays out the fundamentals to help you become a proficent paddler.
Video segments are convienienly organized into accessible chapters for rapid review.
